mapper.insert: INSERT into sys_eve_monitor (id, total_memory, free_memory, max_memory, os_name, total_memory_size, free_physical_memory_size, used_memory, total_thread, cpu_ratio, create_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{totalMemory}, #{freeMemory}, #{maxMemory}, #{osName}, #{totalMemorySize}, #{freePhysicalMemorySize}, #{usedMemory}, #{totalThread}, #{cpuRatio}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT a.total_memory totalMemory, a.free_memory freeMemory, a.max_memory maxMemory, a.os_name osName, a.total_memory_size totalMemorySize, a.free_physical_memory_size freePhysicalMemorySize, a.used_memory usedMemory, a.total_thread totalThread, a.cpu_ratio cpuRatio, CONVERT(a.create_time, char) createTime FROM sys_eve_monitor a ORDER BY a.create_time DESC LIMIT 50
mapper.delete: DELETE a FROM sys_eve_monitor a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.id FROM sys_eve_monitor b ORDER BY b.create_time DESC LIMIT 500 ) t1 ON a.id = t1.id WHERE t1.id IS NULL
